programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each couple embarks on a social test called The Experiment and are promised a chance at healing their marraiges but have no idea what to expect.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each couple meets their new spouse and tension is all around as it brings a different level of openness insecurity and vulnerability.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: The couples try to make the most of the process but the deeper they go the more their values and vows with their original spouses, conflict.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Things begin to heat up as they realize they were paired with the person who can give them exactly what they need at this point in their lives.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: It's the Final Day of the Experiment and the participants leave it all on the table before going back to their original spouses.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: After the ultimate experience the participants return home with their original spouses, and all must decide if they are going to stay together or not.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Should I Stay Or Should I Go?
programme.desc: As each couple finally makes the choice whether to stay together or leave their original spouse, poignant moments reveal insights to their lives prior to 'The Experiment'. Dark pasts and twisted secrets come to light.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: It Ain'T Over Til It'S Over
programme.desc: After the dramatic reveal of their choices to stay or leave, the participants of The Experiment attempt to process the new lives they now face. But The Experiment isn't done with them just yet.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Each participant seriously considers their options when The Experiment offers them a 3-day reprieve, but they only have 24 hours to decide.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Once Upon A Time In Vegas
programme.desc: When The Experiment drops off the individuals taking advantage of the 3-day reprieve in an undisclosed location, they soon rediscover the reasons they fell in love and are forced to confront the ugly truths tearing them apart.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: As the reprieve comes to an end, everyone must choose wisely as The Experiment offers them a chance to decide, once and for all, to stay with or leave their original spouses.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.desc: Having made their final decisions, the participants begin to move on with their lives only to be brought back into The Experiment by a common dark force that connects them all in a mysterious way.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 301: Hit Me With Your Best Shot
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the shooting, the couples gather in shock at a local Las Vegas hospital, reeling from the events that took place as one life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 302: Life Is Like Monkey Bars
programme.desc: A new face enters the fold amidst flashbacks and flash-forwards of the participants complicated relationships with each other. Meanwhile, the consequences of the rooftop shooting reach dire straits.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 303: The Bridge
programme.desc: Sawyer finally chooses between Caroline and Maggie. Carson comes across information about The Experiment that sends him deeper into his downward spiral.

programme.title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy
programme.sub-title: Craig Ross Jr.'s Monogamy 304: The Questions We Ask
programme.desc: Maggie is showing signs of a behavior that Sawyer doesn't know what to make of. Sincere has a new opportunity and Connor is getting closer to finding Harvey. Carson is on the brink of losing his mind, but will he find his answers to The Experiment?
